intro: Elatostema cyrtandrifolioides, commonly known as the small-leaved elatostema, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Urticaceae. It is characterized by its small, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. The plant produces tiny greenish-white flowers arranged in dense clusters. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and is typically found in moist, shaded environments. Elatostema cyrtandrifolioides is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
